      • parseBoolean

        public static boolean parseBoolean(String property,
                                   boolean defaultValue,
                                   Properties properties)
        Helper method used to parse boolean properties.
        Parameters:
        property - The String key for the property
        defaultValue - The default value for the boolean property
        properties - The properties file to get property from
        Returns:
        property from property file, or if it is not specified, the default value
